description:
Naki is a member of http://anidb.net/ch70052 [Aogiri] that served as http://anidb.net/ch68387 [Yamori]`s right-hand man and a current leader of http://anidb.net/ch95853 [White Suits]. He is emotionally unstable and extremely childlike, with complete devotion to his late boss. After Yamori`s death, he became an Executive of Aogiri.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Naki
